attributes.action: Reduce Tesco meal deals back to £3
attributes.additional_details: during the price increase, people, students and families cannot afford fully fresh meals. The convenience has always been appreciated from customers in regards to meal deals. The significant price increase will leave hundreds of British citizens hungry because they are not financially stable to afford a meal deal as frequently
attributes.background: Contact Tesco and make sure they reduce their meal deal back to the original price of £3 across all stores

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about pricing in retail outlets are a matter for retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
